author: COMSOL
description: In this model, a modal analysis is performed while parametrically sweeping the length of a waveguide from 0.5 µm to 4 µm to derive the dispersion curve for the anisotropic core. Both transverse and longitudinal anisotropy are considered in two separate modeling steps.
label: optically_anisotropic_waveguide.mph
name: root
